txt.en: 'Do hurry, I have something wonderful to show you!'
At Dwalin's direction, you have travelled to the abandoned tomb of Skorgrím Dourhand to search for mithril-shaping hammer of Thorin's grandfather, Thrór.
'You didn't tell my father, did you?  You know how he worries.'
'The smiths have taught me all they know, and yet He knows so much more... come, you must meet him!'
'Do not be frightened; Antheron promised there was nothing for me to fear.'
'Uruks!  Hold strong, we can defeat them!'
Search Skorgrím's tomb for Thrór's hammer.
Defeat Faerdami, a fell spirit who has taken possession of Thrór's hammer.
